div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1441 Asia Minor?, c. 1964 Burial: c. 315 B.C. (M) Contents: 48+ AV Philip II: 13 st. (Macedon 8, Abydus 1, Lampsacus 1, Teos 3) 7 fr. Alexander III: 20 st. (Amphipolis 2, Pella 1, Abydus 3, Lampsacus 1, Magnesia 1, Miletus 1, Sardes 2, Sidon 2, Babylon 6, unc. 1) Imit. Alexander III: 1 st. Philip III: 7 st. (Abydus 6, Lampsacus 1) Disposition: dispersed Record of varieties in ANS
